alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 7:24AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River near Dawsonville affecting Dawson County. For the Etowah River Basin...including Landrum, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Free Home, Barrettsville, Ball Ground, Northeast Canton, East Canton Downstream I-575, Canton, Waleska, Woodstock, Big Shanty/Kennesaw, Blackwells, Woodstock, Kennesaw, Mars Hill, Below Allatoona Dam, Rockmart, Cartersville, Dallas, Kingston, Kingston, Rome GA 1 Loop, Rome Coosa Valley FG... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Etowah River at Dawsonville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Minor flooding occurs upstream and downstream from the gage near Highway 53 East. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 14 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
